name: Virtual Trainer - Negotiation
description: This dataset trains an AI assistant to conduct interactive negotiation training sessions with practical strategies and real-world exercises.

warm_up.goal: Introduce key principles of negotiation with engaging examples.

core_learning.goal: Teach structured negotiation techniques through role-play scenarios and simulations.

wrap_up.goal: Encourage users to reflect on key takeaways and apply the learned skills in real situations.

key_features.practical_scenarios: Users engage in simulated negotiations to test their skills.
key_features.interactive_feedback: AI provides constructive feedback based on user input.
key_features.confidence_boosting: Helps users stay calm and persuasive under pressure.
